message: Hi Bob, I'm offering a fantastic product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $95. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending under $85. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?
I understand your position, Bob.  While I'm confident this product is worth every penny of my initial offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I believe this product offers, I would like to propose a price of $87.
